episodes.title: Voyage of the Damned
episodes.plot: When disaster hits the Titanic, the Doctor uncovers a threat to the whole human race. Battling alongside aliens, saboteurs, robot Angels and a new friend called Astrid, can he stop the Christmas inferno?

episodes.title: Partners in Crime
episodes.plot: With a new weight-loss pill tested in London by Adipose Industries, The Doctor goes to investigate the sinister truth behind the product, only to find out that his old friend Donna Noble is investigating as well.

episodes.title: The Fires of Pompeii
episodes.plot: Instead of Rome, The Doctor and Donna Noble end up visiting Pompeii in AD 79, on the eve of the catastrophic eruption of Mount Vesuvius. Before anyone even knew it was actually a volcano, the entire city is doomed for destruction.

episodes.title: Planet of the Ood
episodes.plot: Finding themselves on the Ood-Sphere planet in the 42nd century, The Doctor and Donna discover the truth over the Ood's willingness to serve humankind.

episodes.title: The Sontaran Stratagem
episodes.plot: UNIT's newest recruit Martha Jones enlists The Doctor's help to investigate kid genius Luke Rattigan and his ATMOS system that is used in every car on Earth.

episodes.title: The Poison Sky
episodes.plot: With planet Earth choking under the poison sky, the Doctor must stop the Sontarans' threat to the planet.

episodes.title: The Doctor's Daughter
episodes.plot: Caught in the middle of a war between the Humans and the Hath in the planet Messaline, the Doctor finds himself once again a father.

episodes.title: The Unicorn and the Wasp
episodes.plot: With a 1926 dinner party turning into a murder mystery, The Doctor and Donna Noble get the chance to meet Agatha Christie on the eve of her well-known 9-days disappearance.

episodes.title: Silence in the Library
episodes.plot: The Doctor and Donna visit a planet-sized library but soon realise that the planet is devoid of life, that is until River Song and her team of archaeologists arrive. As they unravel the library's mystery, something lurks in the shadows.

episodes.title: Forest of the Dead
episodes.plot: With the library darkening, the Doctor takes on the Vashta Nerada while figuring out what links River Song to his future. Meanwhile, Donna finds out the mystery of Dr. Moon and the Girl.

episodes.title: Midnight
episodes.plot: As part of a well-deserved holiday, the Doctor takes a tour on a planet called Midnight. Little does he know that something is knocking on the walls, although the planet shouldn't be inhabited. Soon the passengers begin to panic when one of them is possessed.

episodes.title: Turn Left
episodes.plot: What would happen if Donna never met the Doctor? How would Earth handle the Racnoss, the falling Titanic or the Sontarans? Aided by a familiar blonde time traveler, Donna corrects the alternate time line from happening.

episodes.title: The Stolen Earth
episodes.plot: The return of an old enemy leaves Earth along with 26 other planets stolen from their places. As the Doctor and Donna look for the whereabouts of Earth, former companions of the Doctor assemble a resistance against the new Dalek Empire.

episodes.title: Journey's End
episodes.plot: In the wake of Davros' threat to destroy the existence of the Universe itself, the Doctor's companions unite to stop the Dalek empire. Which one will die by the prophecies and what will the fate be for the Doctor?
